works.description: I am a highly skilled and experienced automation developer with a strong background in using various automation tools and frameworks. During my internship, I used the Robot framework to automate tasks and worked on projects involving API development using Flask and testing using POSTMAN. I also have expertise in using libraries such as pandas, numpy, Selenium, AutoGUIX, and have created and published my own custom PyPI modules to overcome project limitations. Furthermore, I have developed modules for crawling folders in the system, capturing screenshots using Pillow, and generating Word documents using python-docx. My ability to think creatively and problem-solve in a fast-paced environment allows me to deliver high-quality solutions within deadlines.

Testimonials.name: Adithya Mallikarjun R
Testimonials.feedback: Akhil's attention to detail and problem-solving skills are unmatched. He consistently delivers high-quality work, no matter how complex the project.

Testimonials.name: Vishnu Charan B
Testimonials.feedback: Working with Akhil has been a pleasure. His ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with our team made the entire development process seamless.

Testimonials.name: Avinash Kumar K
Testimonials.feedback: I've worked with many developers in my career, but Akhil stands out as one of the best. His commitment to delivering exceptional work is truly impressive.
